siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: A decade stronger
frontmatter.description: Relationships take a lot of work and much good fortune. It's worth the effort, and those efforts and luck deserves celebration.

frontmatter.title: Demonstrate what's important
frontmatter.description: It's easy to get caught up in the details and be sidetracked by others. Make it easier with a better structure to each day that emphasizes importance in the right places.

frontmatter.title: Digital products transcend time constraints
frontmatter.description: Time is less in personal control. Work to trade less time for money. Develop repeatable digital products to escape time constraints.

frontmatter.title: Develop options without initial commitments
frontmatter.description: Don't rush to commit, especially when unknowns are present. Be prepared by developing best next steps.

frontmatter.title: Schedule flexibility is a luxury
frontmatter.description: Don't let it become a burden. Recognize the opportunities presented with schedule flexibility, and realize the value of time.

frontmatter.title: Unstuck in time
frontmatter.description: When the next big change is beyond control, a feeling of being unanchored can develop.

frontmatter.title: Allow time to shape next steps
frontmatter.description: The right path can take time. Don't rush into a decision if the path isn't clear. Strive for better, not perfect. Consider that time changes your own perspective.
